name: ノイズ
message: "You used to be really strong, right? You belong in Rhyme."
Noiz falls silent. His gaze is so sharp that it makes me flinch.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Well, that's not really why I'm here today."
Noiz releases me from his gaze and lets out a frustrated sigh.

name: ノイズ
message: "It's gonna be in front of your shop today."

name: ノイズ
message:
"Usui's going to appear here today. Our predictions are always on target."

I frown, not understanding―
But then I hear the cheers from outside.
Noiz steps behind the counter and grabs me by the arm.
I barely manage to grab Ren before he drags me outside.
